Package coms309.RoundTrip.demo.Controller

Class ImageUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • coms309.RoundTrip.demo.Controller.ImageUserController
  • @RestController
public class ImageUserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is our level 2 user that will allow a user to be able to send mmessages and images but is unable to send games

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ImageUser> saveImageUser​(@RequestBody

        REST ENd point that will add a Image user
        Parameters:
        image - Takes in a image user that that will be saved to our repository
        Returns:
        returns an okay ResponseEntitiy that the image user has been saved to out repository throws a 404 is the image post mapping fails

      • getAllImageUsers

        @GetMapping("/image")
public java.util.List<ImageUser> getAllImageUsers()
        REST End point that will list all image user in our ImagingUserRepository
        Returns:
        a all of the image User that is stored in our repository throws a 404 error if the get mapping does not work

public ImageUser newImageUser​(@RequestBody

        this is really useless because we already have a controller that will save a imageUser

        Returns:
